Room.Name: Evander's Armory
Room.ShortDescription: Only the finest chain mail and metallic armors are on display here.
Room.LongDescription: Evander's foundry specializes in metallic armors and some weapons. You won't find any cloth or leather supplies here. Only the finest metals and materials go into these fine armors. Evander's Armory is about the only armory in town that also uses adamantine metal to make their scale mail. Although scale mail is less protective than chain, it lasts significantly longer than virtually all other conventional metals.
